sentences.en: All will play an offshoot of dodge ball.
sentences.cn: 大家一起来玩躲闪球的游戏吧!

sentences.en: An offshoot of the family settled down on the island in the eighteenth century.
sentences.cn: 这个家族的一支旁系于十八世纪在那个岛上定居下来.

sentences.en: The company was originally an offshoot of Bell Telephones.
sentences.cn: 这家公司曾经是贝尔的分支机构.

sentences.en: Vector is a useless survival, or offshoot from quaternions.
sentences.cn: 向量是无用的幸存物或四元数的无价值的支流.

trans.tran_cn: 旁系子孙，支流，分枝，衍生物
trans.tran_en: something such as an organization which has developed from a larger or earlier one
